about_the_game:
DOLL EYE: CHAPTER TWO is the second part of a dialogue-based, story-driven psychological horror game made in RPG Maker MZ.

"You always loved looking up at the sky."

JUNE 5TH, 2020

You arrive at the cemetery. Your son is here. You ask your guardian angel for some alone time, and then he's gone. Despite your instructions, it seems he's entered the hospital. You guess you'll have to be his guardian angel today. If only you could have known.

"There is so much in the world."

Time for work. Again. You fed the bird, you said goodbye... It still feels like you're forgetting something. It probably doesn't matter. Maybe your friends will come by your stand later. God, you're tired...

"People, places, ideas..."

This game features all original art and music. It takes about two hours to beat, but playtime will vary depending on your reading speed, the interactions you have, and the choices you make.
This game has one ending.

"You can't wait to see what's waiting for you."

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains loud/unsettling sounds and imagery, violence and gore, creepy imagery, themes of loss and death, swearing, crude language, innuendo, alcohol, and smoking.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
